0b6e7311c44fa5278b5279b1ecfb8eba57a80f5d.query:
insert into gists_users 
        (username , password, email, secret) values ($1, $2, $3, $4)

1088bc2872170b2ed8511d34ea07062d4bbc420d.query: SELECT ID from gists_privacy WHERE name = $1

1516ec34202a21239aa8275d5637007d4c2c54ad.query:
SELECT
                ID,
                comment,
                owner,
                created,
                gist_public_id
            FROM
                gists_comments_view
            WHERE
                gist_public_id = $1
            ORDER BY created;

19c04856cfeaa552b1fbf5fb1dc5172c1329d88f.query:
INSERT INTO gists_gists 
        (owner_id , description, public_id, privacy, created, updated)
        VALUES (
            (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $1),
            $2, $3, (SELECT ID FROM gists_privacy WHERE name = $4), $5, $6
        )

1ea7ea0bb1a6f4b84a2b9c6b1741c6bf9f1938f1.query:
INSERT INTO gists_comments (owner_id, gist_id, comment, created)
            VALUES (
                (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $1),
                (SELECT ID FROM gists_gists WHERE public_id = $2),
                $3,
                $4
            )

2e627e47d7dce8da4aebfc39f3baf02cbb471d51.query:
SELECT
                owner,
                privacy,
                created,
                updated,
                public_id,
                description
            FROM
                gists_gists_view
            WHERE owner = $1

340413dd6062e88bf2db846a05f600d6d0384f8b.query:
DELETE FROM gists_gists 
        WHERE 
            public_id = $1
        AND
            owner_id = (SELECT ID FROM gists_users WHERE username = $2)
